text: A Fence lizard can be any of several species of spiny lizard (genus Sceloporus), especially: *The eastern fence lizard or northern fence lizard, Sceloporus undulatus *The western fence lizard, Sceloporus occidentalis Note that there are many other species in the Spiny Lizard genus, Sceloporus. Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Fence lizard
